summary.description: A short description of the command

complexity.description: The time complexity of the command using Big-O notation

since.description: The Redis version in which the command was introduced

group.description: The group to which the command belongs

arity.description: The number of arguments the command expects. Negative values mean at least that number of arguments.

return_summary:.description: A summary of the returned replies

return_types.description: The types of replies returned by the command

history.description: A list of changes the command underwent

deprecated.description: The deprecation version and the alternative

command_flags.description: The flags set for the command

acl_categories.description: The ACL categories the command belongs to

key_specs.description: The key name(s) specifications for the command

arguments.description: The arguments supported by the command
